ing: 4 tomatoes on the vine, cored and chopped
3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or more if needed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This salad I grew up on. Flavored with extra-virgin olive oil and fresh chopped oregano."
ins: Mix tomatoes, red onion, cucumber, olive oil, oregano, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl; stir to coat. Let sit for 30 minutes to blend flavors.
